website_summaries.verdict: Quality-made, birch wood wrist roller, available in cylinder or sphere, for improving grip strength and endurance.
pros: Handmade in the USA from birch wood
Cylinder model includes two diameters, 1 and 2.5 inches, and together with sphere-shaped model, allow user to choose which area of wrist, forearm, or hand to focus on strengthening
Seller is currently including two free water weights with purchase
cons: In the expensive range for this type of product

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant between buying this and the other cheaper versions made with pvc handles. I’m glad I decided to pay more and go with this. I really love how I can change grips. This thing is getting my forearms shredded!
customer_reviews.author: Tarzan

customer_reviews.title: 3 inch sphere shorty is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two different dowel type ones and this is significantly better. The 3" balls size hits the muscles harder and the ability to wind it with palms down or palms in gives a broader pump. The two water bags are a joke at a combined 8 pounds. I put a 30 pound dumbbell on it with a passed through loop knot and it gives a great burn! I'm glad I found this one.
customer_reviews.author: Wingnut

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fun addition to our home gym. The water weight it comes with is a bit lame so I clip a 5 pound or 10 pound weight to it. Gives the forearms a quick burn and is safer for my kids then trying to dumbbell curl at the forearm, which can lead to injury if not done with good form. I'm not going to take away that 5th star for the water weight... cool idea, well executed.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: musician, rock climber- excellent forearm therapy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a rockclimber and musician, 40 years+ doing both. This leads to elbow/forearm problems... the Wrist Blaster Shorty is a REALLY good tool to help with hand, wrist, forearm and elbow issues. Have been using for about a week with relatively light weights, up to 8-10 pounds. So far, five minute sessions are more than enough to loosen things and work on strength. Core PRODIGY is an excellent vendor; there was a shipping mistake in first order and they rectified it immediately. Five stars for the product and five stars for the vendor. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Great work out, but the product falls apart really easily
customer_reviews.text: This device will really blast your forearms...but it falls apart really easily. BOTH large wooden handles fell off, and the carabiner that comes with the rope broke after one week of use. The company needs to make the product more sturdy, or at least include several carabiners.
customer_reviews.author: Htown19878

customer_reviews.title: Popeye forearms!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy will give you a wicked pump. I love the multiple grips you can use. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because the 550 cord that is used kinda sucks due to the fact it rolls up at multiple locations which makes the load great on one arm over the other. I’m modifying mine to use a strap instead of the cord which should balance the load and make the exercise smoother. I will post pictures after the modification are done. Other than that this thing is very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly functional and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This wrist roller is far sturdier than many others offered. It feels like it will last forever. I could probably hit a home run in a professional ballpark swinging this thing. Love the two handle sizes. The length of rope to hang the weight from is perfect for me (I'm 6' tall). It just barely touches the floor with arms outstretched. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: First of all it didn’t come with the carabiner that it said would come with. Then when I got a weight hooked onto it it broke within a few minutes. The thicker handles are just shoddily glued on. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best forearm trainer on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best forearm trainer I've ever used. The included water weights work great and are extremely convenient. I ride dirt bikes and my grip endurance has increased noticeably. I highly recommend this for people who enjoy climbing, Moto, defined forearms and grip strength. This is a must have. I bought the rolling pin style FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because of the unique round grip. I especially like that its made of wood. Wrist Blaster is comfortable to use and It works my forearms better then any other equipment that i own! Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Nice training tool
customer_reviews.text: I've always struggled building strong lower arm strength. This is a great tool that will do just that! My wrists are already feeling better!
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: The supplied water bags may come in handy for a cold hangover headache compress - snagged a 10 pound weight collecting dust and works just fine with the Wrist Blaster. Have used 4 times since delivery last week and I see muscles on sides of forearms first time ever. At 64 y.o surprised to see any results, never mind the short time span. Look forward to using every other day - best purchase ever placed on Amazon. Great customer service from this seller. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Myost Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great multi grip roller
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good, I like how you can easily vary or change how you grip it to work different muscles. If the carabiner was small enough to loop through a standard weight plate that would be even better, but that's no big deal and using a weight pin stack ( some wrist rollers come with this ) bypasses this minor inconvenience. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Good product, resistant well built and good feeling in the hands. Good performance to increase forearm strength
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received this march 19th, opened up box and looked at everything. Looks solidly built and good quality. Did not have time for a workout but i did do a set using each grip. I strapped on a 10 lb dumbell and those two sets blew my forearms up quickly! I can tell that i will enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to workout a different angle than the standard wrist roller. Unfortunately I have only used it a few times due to the excessive stress applied to the thumbs.
customer_reviews.author: caril

customer_reviews.title: Big forearm workout all day
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment is solid as they come and it does the job. I put a 20lb dumbbell on end and went at it. By the end my forearms were on fire. Great product and great company.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for forearm strength!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this for about a week and I can already see a huge improvement in my strength and vascularity. I am getting a much better forearm workout than I ever did at the gym. I love how I can target every part of the forearm with the 3” shorty sphere.

customer_reviews.title: You will be glad you bought this tool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works forearms like no other appliance; lots of different angles possible-a very inexpensive and useful addition
customer_reviews.author: Karl L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. It does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. It does what it is supposed to. I felt the forearm workout right away. There are no splinters on the wood at all. It was a fantastic addition to my gym. I would totally recommend it to any of my friends. Shipping was fast and correct. The seller immediately followed up to make sure I was happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product

customer_reviews.author: Jt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a two for one !
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my home gym - with two different group sizes you can do your set and switch to the larger grip for a super set ! Excellent product - buy it !

customer_reviews.title: Easy to useand effective.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for this Exerciser after being introduced to this exercise by a professional physical therapist. The Wrist Blaster exceeded by expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Cancer rehab
customer_reviews.text: I had cancer in my arm and im now rehabing the forearm. The problem i have is that i need to work a specific muscle group that is not easy to work traditionally. After one day this has my arm exhausted and doing what i wanted it to do. I look forward to getting my arm back to normal using this.
customer_reviews.author: scionika

customer_reviews.title: Best blaster
customer_reviews.text: Kid you not improved grip after one session. Have the dowl one would love to have the ball one as well. Wide grip and narrow grip option is great. Blasting my forearms every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Best forearm workout, period
customer_reviews.text: This is the best forearm workout I’ve ever used. I ordered the cylinder grip. It comes with little blue packs that you can fill with water, but I don’t personally use them. I use Olympic weights (15 pounds right now) and it kills! This coupled with farmer carries and my forearms should be big in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ziganto

customer_reviews.title: Great grip burner! Solid build
customer_reviews.text: I had severe elbow tendinitis from lifting in both arms and it has drastically improved when I use this about 4-5 times a week. Way better than going to rehab.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Swavely

customer_reviews.title: This thing is incredible
customer_reviews.text: Construction is solid - I really like the wood and the two different grips. I just hook a 10 lb plate onto the end and that gets me a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will definitely feel this in your forearms
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. The grip is comfortable (wooden, no splinters or roughness) and the construction is solid. The included water weights are great for fine tuning the rope tension to your needs.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star idea, 1 star execution

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The construction of this was much sturdier than I anticipated. Because it is made out of wood it is much more forgiving on the hands. The skinny grip and the 2.5” thick grip work the forearms in different ways. I am very happy with this and I will be buying the 3” tight grip round version soon.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May and have used it in every workout since then. It worked great! However, it is now September and it broke. Personally, I only like buying gym equipment that will last me for years. So, having this break after only a few months was very disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I am 52 years old and have been working out my entire life. I love this item. It is portable and hits parts of the chest that I cannot get with free weights.

customer_reviews.text: By far the best forearm tool I’ve ever used. After the first set my arms felt like they were on fire. The larger grip makes such a difference and you don’t really need to use a lot of weight.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home gym

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and gives you a great workout!

You have the choice to use standard weights or the inflatable weight provided. The inflatable weight is really handy because you can easily fill it with water for home or on the go.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

product_meta.title: Wrist Blaster - Forearm, Hand and Wrist Exerciser
feature_bullets: WRIST & FOREARM - Wrist roller exercise to quickly improve your grip strength and endurance.
FREE WATER WEIGHTS - For a limited time, this offer includes 2 free water weights.
USA MADE - Handmade in the USA from sturdy birch wood. Smaller cylinder 24” long x 1” wide and thick cylinders are 6” long x 2.5” wide.
SIZE and SHAPE - The different outside diameters (1" and 2.5" cylinder dowels) allows users to focus and strengthen different portions of the forearm, wrist and hand.
CORE PRODIGY - From the fitness equipment leader
